OECD_NP -_: The_DT Organization_NP for_IN Economic_NP Cooperation_NP and_CC Development_NP consists_VVZ of_IN Australia_NP ,_, Austria_NP ,_, Belgium_NP ,_, Canada_NP ,_, Czech_NP Republic_NP ,_, Denmark_NP ,_, Finland_NP ,_, France_NP ,_, Germany_NP ,_, Greece_NP ,_, Hungary_NP ,_, Iceland_NP ,_, Ireland_NP ,_, Italy_NP ,_, Republic_NP of_IN Korea_NP ,_, Japan_NP ,_, Luxembourg_NP ,_, Mexico_NP ,_, the_DT Netherlands_NP ,_, New_NP Zealand_NP ,_, Norway_NP ,_, Poland_NP ,_, Portugal_NP ,_, Spain_NP ,_, Sweden_NP ,_, Switzerland_NP ,_, Turkey_NP ,_, the_DT UK_NP ,_, and_CC the_DT US_NP ._SENT 

Party_NN -_: A_DT state_NN (_( or_CC regional_JJ economic_JJ integration_NN organization_NN such_JJ as_IN the_DT EU_NP )_) that_WDT agrees_VVZ to_TO be_VB bound_VVN by_IN a_DT treaty_NN and_CC for_IN which_WDT the_DT treaty_NN has_VHZ entered_VVN into_IN force_NN ._SENT 

President_NN -_: Elected_VVN by_IN the_DT Parties_NNS to_TO preside_VV over_IN the_DT COP_NP ,_, the_DT President_NP is_VBZ often_RB a_DT senior_JJ official_NN or_CC minister_NN from_IN the_DT state_NN or_CC region_NN hosting_VVG the_DT meeting_NN ._SENT 

regional_JJ groups_NNS -_: The_DT five_CD regional_JJ groups_NNS meet_VVP privately_RB to_TO discuss_VV issues_NNS and_CC nominate_VV bureau_NN members_NNS and_CC other_JJ officials_NNS ._SENT They_PP are_VBP Africa_NP ,_, Asia_NP ,_, Central_NP and_CC Eastern_NP Europe_NP (_( CEE_NP )_) ,_, Latin_NP America_NP and_CC the_DT Caribbean_NP (_( GRULAC_NP )_) ,_, and_CC the_DT Western_NP Europe_NP and_CC Others_NPS Group_NP (_( WEOG_NP )_) ._SENT 

secretariat_NN -_: Staffed_NP by_IN international_JJ civil_JJ servants_NNS and_CC responsible_JJ for_IN servicing_VVG the_DT COP_NP and_CC ensuring_VVG its_PP$ smooth_JJ operation_NN ,_, the_DT secretariat_NN makes_VVZ arrangements_NNS for_IN meetings_NNS ,_, compiles_VVZ and_CC prepares_VVZ reports_NNS ,_, and_CC coordinates_VVZ with_IN other_JJ relevant_JJ international_JJ bodies_NNS ._SENT The_DT Climate_NN Change_NP secretariat_NN is_VBZ institutionally_RB linked_VVN to_TO the_DT United_NP Nations_NPS ._SENT 

subsidiary_NN body_NN -_: A_DT committee_NN that_WDT assists_VVZ the_DT Conference_NN of_IN the_DT Parties_NNS ._SENT Two_CD permanent_JJ ones_NNS are_VBP defined_VVN by_IN the_DT Convention_NN :_: the_DT Subsidiary_NP Body_NP for_IN Implementation_NP and_CC the_DT Subsidiary_NP Body_NP for_IN Scientific_NP and_CC Technological_NP Advice_NP ._SENT COP-1_NP also_RB established_VVD two_CD other_JJ temporary_JJ bodies_NNS :_: the_DT Ad_NP hoc_FW Group_NP on_IN the_DT Berlin_NP Mandate_NP ,_, which_WDT concluded_VVD its_PP$ work_NN on_IN 30_CD November_NP 1997_CD ,_, and_CC the_DT Ad_NP hoc_FW Group_NP on_IN Article_NP 13._CD Additional_JJ subsidiary_NN bodies_NNS may_MD be_VB established_VVN as_IN needed_VVN ._SENT 

Subsidiary_NN Body_NN for_IN Implementation_NP (_( SBI_NP )_) -_: Makes_NP recommendations_NNS on_IN policy_NN and_CC implementation_NN issues_NNS to_TO the_DT COP_NP and_CC ,_, if_IN requested_VVN ,_, other_JJ bodies_NNS ._SENT 

Subsidiary_NN Body_NN for_IN Scientific_NP and_CC Technological_NP Advice_NP (_( SBSTA_NP )_) -_: Serves_NP as_IN the_DT link_NN between_IN the_DT information_NN and_CC assessments_NNS provided_VVN by_IN expert_JJ sources_NNS (_( such_JJ as_IN the_DT IPCC_NP )_) on_IN the_DT one_CD hand_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT policy-oriented_JJ needs_NNS of_IN the_DT COP_NP on_IN the_DT other_JJ ._SENT 

II_NP )_) The_DT action_NN (_( meetings_NNS ,_, documents_NNS ,_, process_NN )_) 

agenda_NN -_: A_DT programme_NN of_IN work_NN that_IN/that the_DT delegates_NNS adopt_VVP and_CC are_VBP guided_VVN by_IN ;_: the_DT annotated_VVN agenda_NN contains_VVZ a_DT more_RBR detailed_JJ explanation_NN of_IN each_DT agenda_NN item_NN ._SENT 

amendment_NN -_: The_DT COP_NP can_MD change_VV the_DT existing_JJ Convention_NN text_NN through_IN consensus_NN or_CC ,_, if_IN consensus_NN cannot_MD be_VB reached_VVN ,_, by_IN a_DT three-quarters_NNS majority_NN vote_NN by_IN all_DT Parties_NP present_NN and_CC voting_NN ._SENT 

Berlin_NP Mandate_NP -_: Adopted_NP at_IN COP-1_NP ,_, the_DT Berlin_NP Mandate_NP launched_VVD the_DT talks_NNS that_WDT led_VVD to_TO the_DT adoption_NN of_IN the_DT Kyoto_NP Protocol_NP ._SENT 

consensus_NN -_: An_DT agreement_NN can_MD be_VB adopted_VVN by_IN consensus_NN rather_RB than_IN by_IN a_DT vote_NN when_WRB there_EX are_VBP no_RB stated_VVN objections_NNS from_IN delegations_NNS ._SENT 

contact_NN group_NN -_: The_DT COP_NP or_CC the_DT Committee_NP of_IN the_DT Whole_NP may_MD establish_VV an_DT open-ended_JJ meeting_NN wherein_RB Parties_NP can_MD negotiate_VV before_IN forwarding_VVG agreed_VVN text_NN to_TO the_DT plenary_NN for_IN formal_JJ adoption_NN ._SENT Observers_NNS can_MD generally_RB attend_VV ._SENT 

COP_NN sessions_NNS -_: The_DT first_JJ session_NN of_IN the_DT Conference_NN of_IN the_DT Parties_NP (_( COP-1_NP )_) was_VBD held_VVN in_IN Berlin_NP from_IN 28_CD March_NP to_TO 7_CD April_NP 1995_CD ,_, the_DT second_JJ (_( COP-2_NP )_) in_IN Geneva_NP from_IN 8_CD -_: 19_CD July_NP 1996_CD ,_, the_DT third_JJ (_( COP-3_NP )_) in_IN Kyoto_NP from_IN 1_CD -11_CD December_NP 1997_CD ,_, and_CC the_DT fourth_JJ (_( COP-4_NP )_) is_VBZ being_VBG held_VVN in_IN Buenos_NP Aires_NP from_IN 2_CD -_: 13_CD November_NP 1998._CD 

Conference_NP Room_NP Papers_NP (_( CRPs_NP )_) -_: A_DT category_NN of_IN in-session_NN documents_NNS containing_VVG new_JJ proposals_NNS or_CC outcomes_NNS of_IN in-session_NN work_NN for_IN use_NN only_RB during_IN the_DT session_NN ._SENT 

declaration_NN -_: A_DT non-binding_JJ political_JJ statement_NN made_VVN by_IN ministers_NNS attending_VVG a_DT major_JJ meeting_NN (_( e.g._FW the_DT Geneva_NP Ministerial_NP Declaration_NP at_IN COP-2_NP )_) ._SENT 

decision_NN -_: Unlike_IN a_DT resolution_NN ,_, a_DT decision_NN is_VBZ a_DT formal_JJ agreement_NN and_CC leads_VVZ to_TO binding_JJ actions_NNS ._SENT It_PP becomes_VVZ part_NN of_IN the_DT agreed_VVN body_NN of_IN decisions_NNS that_WDT direct_VVP the_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT COP_NP ._SENT 

documents_NNS -_: Official_JJ meeting_NN documents_NNS are_VBP available_JJ to_TO everyone_NN and_CC feature_VV the_DT logos_NNS of_IN the_DT United_NP Nations_NPS and_CC the_DT Climate_NN Change_NP Convention_NP and_CC a_DT reference_NN number_NN ,_, such_JJ as_IN FCCC_NP /_SYM CP_NP /_SYM 1998_CD /_SYM 1._CD Pre-session_NN documents_NNS are_VBP available_JJ before_IN the_DT meeting_NN ,_, often_RB in_IN all_DT six_CD UN_NP languages_NNS ._SENT In-session_NN documents_NNS are_VBP distributed_VVN on-site_JJ (_( see_VV CRPs_NP ,_, L_NP docs_NNS ,_, Misc_NN ._SENT docs_NNS ,_, and_CC nonpapers_NNS )_) ._SENT Informal_JJ documents_NNS are_VBP often_RB distributed_VVN outside_IN the_DT meeting_NN room_NN by_IN observers_NNS ._SENT 

drafting_VVG groups_NNS -_: To_TO facilitate_VV negotiations_NNS ,_, the_DT President_NP or_CC the_DT Chair_NN may_MD establish_VV smaller_JJR drafting_VVG groups_NNS to_TO meet_VV separately_RB and_CC in_RB private_JJ to_TO prepare_VV text_NN ._SENT Observers_NNS generally_RB may_MD not_RB attend_VV ._SENT 

entry_NN into_IN force_NN -_: Intergovernmental_NP agreements_NNS ,_, including_VVG protocols_NNS and_CC amendments_NNS ,_, are_VBP not_RB legally_RB binding_JJ until_IN they_PP have_VHP been_VBN ratified_VVN by_IN a_DT certain_JJ number_NN of_IN countries_NNS ;_: the_DT Climate_NN Change_NP Convention_NP required_VVD 50_CD and_CC enters_VVZ into_IN force_NN for_IN each_DT new_JJ Party_NP 90_CD days_NNS after_IN it_PP ratifies_VVZ ._SENT 

informal_JJ contact_NN group_NN -_: On_IN the_DT instructions_NNS of_IN the_DT President_NP or_CC Chair_NP ,_, delegates_NNS may_MD meet_VV in_IN private_JJ to_TO discuss_VV specific_JJ matters_NNS in_IN order_NN to_TO consolidate_VV different_JJ views_NNS ,_, reach_VV a_DT compromise_NN ,_, and_CC produce_VV an_DT agreed_VVN proposal_NN ,_, often_RB in_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN a_DT written_JJ text_NN ._SENT 

L_NP ._SENT docs_NNS -_: In-session_NN documents_NNS that_WDT contain_VVP draft_NN reports_NNS and_CC texts_NNS for_IN adoption_NN by_IN the_DT COP_NP or_CC the_DT subsidiary_NN bodies_NNS ,_, usually_RB in_IN all_DT 6_CD UN_NP languages_NNS ._SENT 

meetings_NNS vs._CC sessions_NNS -_: Each_DT session_NN of_IN the_DT COP_NP is_VBZ divided_VVN into_IN a_DT number_NN of_IN meetings_NNS ._SENT Each_DT meeting_NN is_VBZ generally_RB scheduled_VVN from_IN 10_CD a.m._NN to_TO 1_CD p.m._NN or_CC from_IN 3_CD p.m._NN to_TO 6_CD p.m._NN ,_, so_RB that_IN/that the_DT morning_NN of_IN 2_CD November_NP will_MD be_VB the_DT first_JJ meeting_NN of_IN the_DT fourth_JJ session_NN of_IN the_DT COP_NP ._SENT 

misc_NN ._SENT docs_NNS -_: Miscellaneous_JJ documents_NNS are_VBP issued_VVN on_IN plain_JJ paper_NN with_IN no_DT UN_NP masthead_NN ;_: they_PP generally_RB contain_VVP views_NNS or_CC comments_NNS submitted_VVN as_IN received_VVN from_IN a_DT delegation_NN without_IN formal_JJ editing_VVG ._SENT 

nonpapers_NNS -_: In-session_NN documents_NNS issued_VVD informally_RB to_TO facilitate_VV negotiations_NNS ;_: they_PP do_VVP not_RB have_VH an_DT official_JJ document_NN symbol_NN although_IN they_PP may_MD have_VH an_DT identifying_VVG number_NN or_CC the_DT name_NN of_IN the_DT authors_NNS ._SENT 

plenary_NN -_: A_DT meeting_NN of_IN the_DT entire_JJ COP_NP where_WRB all_DT formal_JJ decisions_NNS are_VBP taken_VVN ._SENT 

protocol_NN -_: A_DT protocol_NN is_VBZ linked_VVN to_TO an_DT existing_JJ convention_NN ,_, but_CC it_PP is_VBZ a_DT separate_JJ and_CC additional_JJ agreement_NN that_WDT must_MD be_VB signed_VVN and_CC ratified_VVN by_IN the_DT Parties_NNS to_TO the_DT convention_NN ._SENT Protocols_NNS typically_RB strengthen_VVP a_DT convention_NN by_IN adding_VVG new_JJ ,_, more_RBR detailed_JJ commitments_NNS ._SENT 

ratification_NN -_: After_IN signing_VVG the_DT Convention_NN or_CC the_DT Protocol_NP ,_, a_DT country_NN must_MD ratify_VV it_PP ,_, often_RB with_IN the_DT approval_NN of_IN its_PP$ parliament_NN or_CC other_JJ legislature_NN ._SENT The_DT instrument_NN of_IN ratification_NN must_MD be_VB deposited_VVN with_IN the_DT depositary_NN (_( in_IN this_DT case_NN the_DT UN_NP Secretary-General_NP )_) to_TO start_VV the_DT 90-day_JJ countdown_NN to_TO becoming_VVG a_DT Party_NP ._SENT 

recommendation_NN -_: Weaker_NP than_IN a_DT decision_NN or_CC a_DT resolution_NN and_CC not_RB binding_VVG on_IN Parties_NNS ._SENT 

reservation_NN -_: A_DT Party_NP may_MD accept_VV a_DT decision_NN of_IN the_DT COP_NP while_IN noting_VVG its_PP$ reservations_NNS and_CC concerns_NNS for_IN the_DT record_NN ._SENT However_RB ,_, no_DT reservations_NNS may_MD be_VB made_VVN to_TO the_DT Convention_NN itself_PP or_CC to_TO the_DT Protocol_NP ._SENT 

resolution_NN -_: Unlike_IN decisions_NNS ,_, resolutions_NNS do_VVP not_RB generally_RB become_VVN part_NN of_IN the_DT formal_JJ body_NN of_IN decisions_NNS that_WDT guide_VVP the_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT COP_NP ._SENT They_PP are_VBP directives_NNS that_DT guide_NN ,_, opinions_NNS rather_RB than_IN permanent_JJ legal_JJ acts_NNS ._SENT 

rules_NNS of_IN procedure_NN -_: The_DT rules_NNS that_WDT govern_VVP the_DT proceedings_NNS of_IN the_DT COP_NP ,_, including_VVG the_DT procedures_NNS for_IN decision-making_NN and_CC participation_NN ._SENT The_DT COP_NP has_VHZ not_RB yet_RB adopted_VVN the_DT rules_NNS and_CC all_RB expect_VV one_PP (_( on_IN voting_NN )_) are_VBP currently_RB being_VBG "_`` applied_VVN "_'' ._SENT 

Second_NP Assessment_NP Report_NP (_( SAR_NP )_) -_: Also_RB known_VVN as_IN Climate_NN Change_NP 1995_CD ,_, the_DT IPCC_NP 's_POS SAR_NN was_VBD written_VVN and_CC reviewed_VVN by_IN some_DT 2_CD ,_, 000_CD scientists_NNS and_CC experts_NNS world-wide_JJ ._SENT It_PP concluded_VVD that_IN/that "_`` the_DT balance_NN of_IN evidence_NN suggests_VVZ that_IN/that there_EX is_VBZ a_DT discernible_JJ human_JJ influence_NN on_IN global_JJ climate_NN "_'' and_CC confirmed_VVD the_DT availability_NN of_IN "_`` no-regrets_NNS "_'' options_NNS and_CC other_JJ cost-effective_JJ strategies_NNS for_IN combating_VVG climate-change_NN ._SENT 

signature_NN -_: The_DT head_NN of_IN state_NN or_CC government_NN ,_, the_DT foreign_JJ minister_NN ,_, or_CC another_DT designated_VVN official_NN indicates_VVZ his_PP$ or_CC her_PP$ country_NN 's_POS agreement_NN with_IN the_DT adopted_VVN text_NN of_IN the_DT Convention_NP or_CC the_DT Protocol_NP and_CC its_PP$ intention_NN to_TO become_VV a_DT Party_NN by_IN signing_NN ._SENT 

square_JJ brackets_NNS -_: Used_JJ during_IN negotiations_NNS to_TO indicate_VV that_IN/that a_DT section_NN of_IN text_NN is_VBZ being_VBG discussed_VVN but_CC has_VHZ not_RB yet_RB been_VBN agreed_VVN ._SENT 

Third_NP Assessment_NP Report_NP (_( TAR_NP )_) -_: The_DT IPCC_NP 's_POS Third_NP Assessment_NP Report_NP is_VBZ expected_VVN to_TO be_VB finalized_VVN in_IN late_JJ 2000_CD and_CC published_VVN in_IN early_RB 2001._CD 

III_NP )_) The_DT issues_NNS 

activities_NNS implemented_VVN jointly_RB (_( AIJ_NP )_) -_: Under_IN a_DT pilot_NN phase_NN that_WDT ends_VVZ by_IN 2000_CD ,_, AIJ_NP activities_NNS can_MD be_VB carried_VVN out_RP through_IN partnerships_NNS between_IN an_DT investor_NN from_IN a_DT developed_VVN country_NN and_CC a_DT counterpart_NN in_IN a_DT host_NN country_NN ._SENT The_DT purpose_NN is_VBZ to_TO involve_VV private-sector_JJ money_NN in_IN the_DT transfer_NN of_IN technology_NN and_CC know-how_NN ._SENT See_VV also_RB Joint_NP Implementation_NP ._SENT 

Article_NN 4.1_CD -_: This_DT Convention_NP article_NN contains_VVZ general_JJ commitments_NNS for_IN all_DT Parties_NNS -_: developing_VVG and_CC developed_VVN ._SENT 

Article_NN 4.2_CD -_: This_DT Convention_NP article_NN contains_VVZ specific_JJ commitments_NNS for_IN developed_JJ country_NN (_( Annex_NP I_NP )_) Parties_NNS only_RB ,_, notably_RB to_TO take_VV measures_NNS aimed_VVN at_IN returning_VVG greenhouse_NN gas_NN emissions_NNS to_TO 1990_CD levels_NNS by_IN the_DT year_NN 2000._CD 

clean_JJ development_NN mechanism_NN (_( CDM_NP )_) -_: The_DT Kyoto_NP Protocol_NP establishes_VVZ the_DT CDM_NP to_TO enable_VV industrialized_JJ countries_NNS to_TO finance_VV emissions-avoiding_NN projects_NNS in_IN developing_VVG countries_NNS and_CC receive_VV credit_NN for_IN doing_VVG so_RB ._SENT 

emissions_NNS trading_NN -_: The_DT Kyoto_NP Protocol_NP establishes_VVZ a_DT mechanism_NN whereby_WRB Parties_NNS with_IN emissions_NNS commitments_NNS may_MD trade_VV their_PP$ emission_NN allowances_NNS with_IN other_JJ Parties_NNS ._SENT The_DT aim_NN is_VBZ to_TO improve_VV the_DT overall_JJ flexibility_NN and_CC economic_JJ efficiency_NN of_IN making_VVG emissions_NNS cuts_NNS ._SENT 

financial_JJ mechanism_NN -_: As_RB defined_VVN by_IN the_DT Convention_NN ,_, its_PP$ role_NN is_VBZ to_TO transfer_VV funds_NNS and_CC technologies_NNS to_TO developing_VVG countries_NNS on_IN a_DT grant_NN or_CC consessional_JJ basis_NN ,_, under_IN the_DT guidance_NN of_IN the_DT COP_NP ._SENT The_DT Global_NP Environment_NP Facility_NP is_VBZ "_`` operating_VVG "_'' the_DT mechanism_NN on_IN an_DT interim_JJ basis_NN ._SENT 

greenhouse_NN gases_NNS (_( GHGs_NP )_) -_: The_DT major_JJ GHGs_NNS responsible_JJ for_IN causing_VVG climate-change_NN are_VBP carbon_NN dioxide_NN (_( CO2_NP )_) ,_, methane_NN (_( CH4_NP )_) ,_, and_CC nitrous_JJ oxide_NN (_( N20_NP )_) ._SENT The_DT Kyoto_NP Protocol_NP also_RB addresses_VVZ hydrofluorocarbons_NNS (_( HFCs_NP )_) ,_, perfluorocarbons_NNS (_( PFCs_NP )_) ,_, and_CC sulphur_NN hexafluoride_NN (_( SF6_NP )_) ._SENT 

"_'' hot_JJ air_NN "_'' -_: Refers_NNS to_TO the_DT concern_NN that_IN/that some_DT governments_NNS will_MD be_VB able_JJ to_TO meet_VV their_PP$ commitment_NN targets_NNS with_IN minimal_JJ effort_NN and_CC could_MD then_RB flood_VV the_DT market_NN for_IN emissions_NNS credits_NNS ,_, reducing_VVG the_DT incentive_NN for_IN other_JJ countries_NNS to_TO cut_VV their_PP$ own_JJ domestic_JJ emissions_NNS ._SENT 

in-depth_JJ review_NN (_( IDR_NP )_) -_: The_DT first_JJ submissions_NNS of_IN national_JJ communications_NNS by_IN developed_JJ countries_NNS were_VBD subjected_VVN to_TO a_DT series_NN of_IN in-depth_JJ reviews_NNS generally_RB involving_VVG country_NN visits_NNS by_IN international_JJ teams_NNS of_IN experts_NNS ._SENT 

joint_JJ implementation_NN (_( JI_NP )_) -_: The_DT Kyoto_NP Protocol_NP establishes_VVZ a_DT mechanism_NN whereby_WRB a_DT developed_VVN country_NN can_MD receive_VV "_`` emissions_NNS reduction_NN units_NNS "_'' when_WRB it_PP helps_VVZ to_TO finance_VV projects_NNS that_WDT reduce_VVP net_JJ emissions_NNS in_IN another_DT developed_VVN country_NN (_( including_VVG countries_NNS with_IN economies_NNS in_IN transition_NN )_) ._SENT Some_DT aspects_NNS of_IN this_DT approach_NN are_VBP being_VBG tested_VVN as_IN Activities_NP Implemented_NP Jointly_NP (_( see_VV AIJ_NP )_) ._SENT 

mechanisms_NNS -_: The_DT Kyoto_NP Protocol_NP establishes_VVZ three_CD mechanisms_NNS to_TO increase_VV the_DT flexibility_NN and_CC reduce_VV the_DT costs_NNS of_IN making_VVG emissions_NNS cuts_NNS ;_: these_DT are_VBP the_DT Clean_NP Development_NP Mechanism_NP ,_, emissions_NNS trading_NN ,_, and_CC joint_JJ implementation_NN ._SENT 

national_JJ communications_NNS -_: A_DT central_JJ requirement_NN of_IN the_DT Convention_NN (_( and_CC the_DT Protocol_NP )_) is_VBZ that_IN/that each_DT Party_NP must_MD inform_VV the_DT others_NNS about_IN its_PP$ national_JJ climate-change_NN activities_NNS ._SENT Many_JJ developed_JJ countries_NNS have_VHP submitted_VVN their_PP$ second_JJ reports_NNS and_CC developing_VVG countries_NNS have_VHP started_VVN to_TO submit_VV their_PP$ first_JJ ._SENT 

policies_NNS and_CC measures_NNS -_: Countries_NPS must_MD decide_VV what_WP policies_NNS and_CC measures_NNS to_TO adopt_VV in_IN order_NN to_TO achieve_VV their_PP$ emissions_NNS targets_NNS ._SENT Some_DT possible_JJ policies_NNS and_CC measures_NNS which_WDT Parties_NNS could_MD implement_VV are_VBP listed_VVN in_IN the_DT Kyoto_NP Protocol_NP and_CC could_MD offer_VV opportunities_NNS for_IN intergovernmental_JJ cooperation_NN ._SENT 

Quantified_VVN Emissions_NPS Limitation_NP and_CC Reduction_NP Commitments_NP -_: Legally-binding_NP targets_NNS and_CC timetables_NNS under_IN the_DT Kyoto_NP Protocol_NP for_IN the_DT limitation_NN or_CC reduction_NN of_IN greenhouse_NN gas_NN emissions_NNS for_IN developed_JJ countries_NNS ._SENT 

review_NN of_IN commitments_NNS -_: The_DT Parties_NNS must_MD regularly_RB review_VV the_DT adequacy_NN of_IN the_DT Convention_NP 's_POS Article_NP 4.2_CD (_( a_DT )_) and_CC (_( b_LS )_) outlining_VVG developed_VVN country_NN commitments_NNS to_TO limit_VV emissions_NNS ._SENT The_DT first_JJ review_NN took_VVD place_NN at_IN COP-1_NP and_CC led_VVD to_TO the_DT Berlin_NP Mandate_NP and_CC the_DT adoption_NN of_IN the_DT Kyoto_NP Protocol_NP ._SENT The_DT second_JJ review_NN is_VBZ to_TO take_VV place_NN in_IN Buenos_NP Aires_NP ._SENT 

sinks_NNS -_: Under_IN the_DT Kyoto_NP Protocol_NP ,_, developed_VVD countries_NNS can_MD include_VV changes_NNS in_IN net_JJ emissions_NNS (_( calculated_VVN as_IN emissions_NNS minus_CC removals_NNS of_IN CO2_NP )_) from_IN certain_JJ activities_NNS in_IN the_DT land-use_NN change_NN and_CC forestry_NN sector_NN ._SENT Calculating_VVG the_DT effects_NNS of_IN sinks_NNS (_( growing_VVG vegetation_NN tends_VVZ to_TO absorb_VV carbon_NN dioxide_NN from_IN the_DT atmosphere_NN )_) is_VBZ methodologically_RB complex_JJ and_CC still_RB needs_VVZ to_TO be_VB clarified_VVN ._SENT 

voluntary_JJ commitments_NNS -_: During_IN the_DT Kyoto_NP negotiations_NNS ,_, a_DT draft_NN article_NN that_WDT would_MD have_VH permitted_VVN developing_VVG countries_NNS to_TO voluntary_NN adhere_VV to_TO legally_RB binding_JJ emissions_NNS targets_NNS was_VBD dropped_VVN in_IN the_DT final_JJ hours_NNS ._SENT This_DT issue_NN remains_VVZ important_JJ for_IN some_DT negotiators_NNS and_CC may_MD be_VB discussed_VVN in_IN Buenos_NP Aires_NP ._SENT 

AAU_NP 
Assigned_VVN amount_NN unit_NN ._SENT A_DT Kyoto_NP Protocol_NP unit_NN equal_JJ to_TO 1_CD metric_JJ tonne_NN of_IN CO2_NP equivalent_NN ._SENT Each_DT Annex_NP I_NP Party_NP issues_NNS AAUs_NP up_RB to_TO the_DT level_NN of_IN its_PP$ assigned_JJ amount_NN ,_, established_VVN pursuant_JJ to_TO Article_NP 3_CD ,_, paragraphs_VVZ 7_CD and_CC 8_CD ,_, of_IN the_DT Kyoto_NP Protocol_NP ._SENT Assigned_VVN amount_NN units_NNS may_MD be_VB exchanged_VVN through_IN emissions_NNS trading_NN ._SENT 

Abatement_NN 
Refers_VVZ to_TO reducing_VVG the_DT degree_NN or_CC intensity_NN of_IN greenhouse-gas_NN emissions_NNS ._SENT 

AC_NP 
Adaptation_NN Committee_NP ._SENT The_DT Adaptation_NP Committee_NP was_VBD established_VVN by_IN the_DT Conference_NN of_IN the_DT Parties_NNS as_IN part_NN of_IN the_DT Cancun_NP Agreements_NPS to_TO promote_VV the_DT implementation_NN of_IN enhanced_JJ action_NN on_IN adaptation_NN in_IN a_DT coherent_JJ manner_NN under_IN the_DT Convention_NN ,_, inter_VV alia_NP ,_, through_IN various_JJ functions_NNS ._SENT More_JJR information_NN available_JJ here_RB ._SENT 

Accession_NN 
An_DT act_NN whereby_WRB a_DT State_NN becomes_VVZ a_DT Party_NN to_TO a_DT treaty_NN already_RB negotiated_VVN and_CC signed_VVN by_IN other_JJ States_NNS ;_: has_VHZ the_DT same_JJ legal_JJ effect_NN as_IN ratification_NN ._SENT 

Adaptation_NN 
Adjustment_NN in_IN natural_JJ or_CC human_JJ systems_NNS in_IN response_NN to_TO actual_JJ or_CC expected_VVN climatic_JJ stimuli_NNS or_CC their_PP$ effects_NNS ,_, which_WDT moderates_VVZ harm_NN or_CC exploits_VVZ beneficial_JJ opportunities_NNS ._SENT 

Adaptation_NN Fund_NN 
The_DT Adaptation_NP Fund_NP was_VBD established_VVN to_TO finance_VV concrete_JJ adaptation_NN projects_NNS and_CC programmes_NNS in_IN developing_VVG countries_NNS that_WDT are_VBP particularly_RB vulnerable_JJ and_CC are_VBP Parties_NNS to_TO the_DT Kyoto_NP Protocol_NP ._SENT The_DT Fund_NN is_VBZ to_TO be_VB financed_VVN with_IN a_DT share_NN of_IN proceeds_NNS from_IN clean_JJ development_NN mechanism_NN (_( CDM_NP )_) project_NN activities_NNS and_CC receive_VV funds_NNS from_IN other_JJ sources_NNS ._SENT It_PP is_VBZ operated_VVN by_IN the_DT Adaptation_NP Fund_NP Board_NP ._SENT More_JJR information_NN available_JJ here_RB ._SENT 

ADP_NP

Biomass_NN fuels_NNS or_CC biofuels_NNS 
A_DT fuel_NN produced_VVN from_IN dry_JJ organic_JJ matter_NN or_CC combustible_JJ oils_NNS produced_VVN by_IN plants_NNS ._SENT 
These_DT fuels_NNS are_VBP considered_VVN renewable_JJ as_RB long_RB as_IN the_DT vegetation_NN producing_VVG them_PP is_VBZ maintained_VVN or_CC replanted_VVD ,_, such_JJ as_IN firewood_NN ,_, alcohol_NN fermented_VVD from_IN sugar_NN ,_, and_CC combustible_JJ oils_NNS extracted_VVN from_IN soy_NN beans_NNS ._SENT Their_PP$ use_NN in_IN place_NN of_IN fossil_JJ fuels_NNS cuts_NNS greenhouse_NN gas_NN emissions_NNS because_IN the_DT plants_NNS that_WDT are_VBP the_DT fuel_NN sources_NNS capture_VV carbon_NN dioxide_NN from_IN the_DT atmosphere_NN ._SENT

carbon-market_NN 
A_DT popular_JJ (_( but_RB misleading_VVG )_) term_NN for_IN a_DT trading_NN system_NN through_IN which_WDT countries_NNS may_MD buy_VV or_CC sell_VV units_NNS of_IN greenhouse-gas_NN emissions_NNS in_IN an_DT effort_NN to_TO meet_VV their_PP$ national_JJ limits_NNS on_IN emissions_NNS ,_, either_CC under_IN the_DT Kyoto_NP Protocol_NP or_CC under_IN other_JJ agreements_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN that_IN/that among_IN member_NN states_NNS of_IN the_DT European_NP Union_NP ._SENT The_DT term_NN comes_VVZ from_IN the_DT fact_NN that_IN/that carbon_NN dioxide_NN is_VBZ the_DT predominant_JJ greenhouse_NN gas_NN ,_, and_CC other_JJ gases_NNS are_VBP measured_VVN in_IN units_NNS called_VVD "_`` carbon-dioxide_NN equivalents_NNS ._SENT "_''

Intergovernmental_JJ Panel_NN on_IN Climate_NN Change_NP (_( IPCC_NP )_) 
Established_VVN in_IN 1988_CD by_IN the_DT World_NP Meteorological_NP Organization_NP and_CC the_DT UN_NP Environment_NP Programme_NP ,_, the_DT IPCC_NP surveys_VVZ world-wide_RB scientific_JJ and_CC technical_JJ literature_NN and_CC publishes_VVZ assessment_NN reports_NNS that_WDT are_VBP widely_RB recognized_VVN as_IN the_DT most_RBS credible_JJ existing_JJ sources_NNS of_IN information_NN on_IN climate-change_NN ._SENT The_DT IPCC_NP also_RB works_VVZ on_IN methodologies_NNS and_CC responds_VVZ to_TO specific_JJ requests_NNS from_IN the_DT Convention_NN 's_POS subsidiary_NN bodies_NNS ._SENT The_DT IPCC_NP is_VBZ independent_JJ of_IN the_DT Convention_NN ._SENT

Joint_JJ implementation_NN (_( JI_NP )_) 
A_DT mechanism_NN under_IN the_DT Kyoto_NP Protocol_NP through_IN which_WDT a_DT developed_VVN country_NN can_MD receive_VV "_`` emissions_NNS reduction_NN units_NNS "_'' when_WRB it_PP helps_VVZ to_TO finance_VV projects_NNS that_WDT reduce_VVP net_JJ greenhouse-gas_NN emissions_NNS in_IN another_DT developed_VVN country_NN (_( in_IN practice_NN ,_, the_DT recipient_JJ state_NN is_VBZ likely_JJ to_TO be_VB a_DT country_NN with_IN an_DT "_`` economy_NN in_IN transition_NN "_'' )_) ._SENT An_DT Annex_NP I_NP Party_NP must_MD meet_VV specific_JJ eligibility_NN requirements_NNS to_TO participate_VV in_IN joint_JJ implementation_NN ._SENT

An_DT acronym_NN representing_VVG non-EU_NP industrialized_JJ countries_NNS which_WDT occasionally_RB meet_VVP to_TO discuss_VV various_JJ issues_NNS related_VVN to_TO climate-change_NN ._SENT The_DT members_NNS are_VBP Japan_NP ,_, the_DT United_NP States_NPS ,_, Switzerland_NP ,_, Canada_NP ,_, Australia_NP ,_, Norway_NP ,_, and_CC New_NP Zealand_NP ._SENT Iceland_NP ,_, Mexico_NP ,_, and_CC the_DT Republic_NP of_IN Korea_NP may_MD also_RB attend_VV JUSSCANZ_NP meetings_NNS ._SENT

Kyoto_NP mechanisms_NNS

Leakage_NN

Least_JJS Developed_NP Countries_NP (_( LDCs_NP )_) 
The_DT world_NN 's_POS poorest_JJS countries_NNS ._SENT The_DT criteria_NNS currently_RB used_VVN by_IN the_DT Economic_NP and_CC Social_NP Council_NP (_( ECOSOC_NP )_) for_IN designation_NN as_IN an_DT LDC_NP include_VVP low_JJ income_NN ,_, human_JJ resource_NN weakness_NN and_CC economic_JJ vulnerability_NN ._SENT Currently_RB 48_CD countries_NNS have_VHP been_VBN designated_VVN by_IN the_DT UN_NP General_NP Assembly_NP as_IN LDCs_NP ._SENT

Mitigation_NN 
In_IN the_DT context_NN of_IN climate-change_NN ,_, a_DT human_JJ intervention_NN to_TO reduce_VV the_DT sources_NNS or_CC enhance_VV the_DT sinks_NNS of_IN greenhouse_NN gases_NNS ._SENT Examples_NNS include_VVP using_VVG fossil_JJ fuels_NNS more_RBR efficiently_RB for_IN industrial_JJ processes_NNS or_CC electricity_NN generation_NN ,_, switching_VVG to_TO solar_JJ energy_NN or_CC wind_NN power_NN ,_, improving_VVG the_DT insulation_NN of_IN buildings_NNS ,_, and_CC expanding_VVG forests_NNS and_CC other_JJ "_`` sinks_NNS "_'' to_TO remove_VV greater_JJR amounts_NNS of_IN carbon_NN dioxide_NN from_IN the_DT atmosphere_NN ._SENT

"_'' No-regrets_NP options_NNS "_''

Policies_NNS and_CC measures_NNS (_( PAMs_NP )_) 
A_DT frequently_RB used_VVN phrase_NN --_: sometimes_RB abbreviated_VVN as_IN PAMs_NP --_: referring_VVG to_TO the_DT steps_NNS taken_VVN or_CC to_TO be_VB taken_VVN by_IN countries_NNS to_TO reduce_VV greenhouse-gas_NN emissions_NNS under_IN the_DT UNFCCC_NP and_CC the_DT Kyoto_NP Protocol_NP ._SENT Some_DT possible_JJ policies_NNS and_CC measures_NNS are_VBP listed_VVN in_IN the_DT Protocol_NP and_CC could_MD offer_VV opportunities_NNS for_IN intergovernmental_JJ cooperation_NN ._SENT 

President_NN

Protocol_NP

R_LS 

Ratification_NN 
Formal_JJ approval_NN ,_, often_RB by_IN a_DT Parliament_NP or_CC other_JJ national_JJ legislature_NN ,_, of_IN a_DT convention_NN ,_, protocol_NN ,_, or_CC treaty_NN ,_, enabling_VVG a_DT country_NN to_TO become_VV a_DT Party_NP ._SENT Ratification_NN is_VBZ a_DT separate_JJ process_NN that_WDT occurs_VVZ after_IN a_DT country_NN has_VHZ signed_VVN an_DT agreement_NN ._SENT The_DT instrument_NN of_IN ratification_NN must_MD be_VB deposited_VVN with_IN a_DT "_`` depositary_NN "_'' (_( in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN the_DT Climate_NN Change_NP Convention_NP ,_, the_DT UN_NP Secretary-General_NP )_) to_TO start_VV the_DT countdown_NN to_TO becoming_VVG a_DT Party_NP (_( in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN the_DT Convention_NP ,_, the_DT countdown_NN is_VBZ 90_CD days_NNS )_) ._SENT 

Recommendation_NN 
A_DT formal_JJ act_NN of_IN the_DT COP_NP or_CC the_DT CMP_NN which_WDT is_VBZ weaker_JJR than_IN a_DT decision_NN or_CC a_DT resolution_NN ,_, and_CC is_VBZ not_RB binding_VVG on_IN Parties_NNS to_TO the_DT Convention_NN or_CC the_DT Kyoto_NP Protocol_NP ._SENT

Replanting_VVG of_IN forests_NNS on_IN lands_NNS that_WDT have_VHP previously_RB contained_VVN forests_NNS but_CC that_WDT have_VHP been_VBN converted_VVN to_TO some_DT other_JJ use_NN ._SENT 

REG_NN document_NN

Regional_JJ groups_NNS 
Alliances_NNS of_IN countries_NNS ,_, in_IN most_JJS cases_NNS sharing_VVG the_DT same_JJ geographic_JJ region_NN ,_, which_WDT meet_VVP privately_RB to_TO discuss_VV issues_NNS and_CC nominate_VV bureau_NN members_NNS and_CC other_JJ officials_NNS for_IN activities_NNS under_IN the_DT Convention_NN ._SENT The_DT five_CD regional_JJ groups_NNS are_VBP Africa_NP ,_, Asia_NP ,_, Central_NP and_CC Eastern_NP Europe_NP (_( CEE_NP )_) ,_, Latin_NP America_NP and_CC the_DT Caribbean_NP (_( GRULAC_NP )_) ,_, and_CC the_DT Western_NP Europe_NP and_CC Others_NPS Group_NP (_( WEOG_NP )_) ._SENT 

Registries_NNS ,_, registry_NN systems_NNS

Reservation_NN 
An_DT exception_NN or_CC concern_NN noted_VVD for_IN the_DT record_NN by_IN a_DT Party_NP in_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN accepting_VVG a_DT decision_NN of_IN the_DT COP_NP or_CC the_DT CMP_NN ._SENT No_DT reservations_NNS are_VBP allowed_VVN to_TO the_DT Convention_NN itself_PP ,_, or_CC to_TO the_DT Protocol_NP ._SENT 

Reservoirs_NNS 
A_DT component_NN or_CC components_NNS of_IN the_DT climate-system_NN where_WRB a_DT greenhouse_NN gas_NN or_CC a_DT precursor_NN of_IN a_DT greenhouse_NN gas_NN is_VBZ stored_VVN ._SENT Trees_NNS are_VBP "_`` reservoirs_NNS "_'' for_IN carbon_NN dioxide_NN ._SENT 

Resolution_NP 
Directives_NNS that_WDT guide_VVP the_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT COP_NP or_CC the_DT CMP--_NP opinions_NNS rather_RB than_IN permanent_JJ legal_JJ acts_NNS ._SENT Unlike_IN decisions_NNS ,_, resolutions_NNS do_VVP not_RB generally_RB become_VVN part_NN of_IN the_DT formal_JJ body_NN of_IN legislation_NN enacted_VVN by_IN the_DT COP_NP or_CC the_DT CMP_NN ._SENT 

Review_NN of_IN commitments_NNS 
Regular_JJ scrutiny_NN by_IN Convention_NP Parties_NP of_IN the_DT adequacy_NN of_IN the_DT treaty_NN 's_POS Article_NP 4.2_CD (_( a_DT )_) and_CC (_( b_LS )_) outlining_VVG developed_VVN country_NN commitments_NNS to_TO limit_VV greenhouse-gas_NN emissions_NNS ._SENT The_DT first_JJ review_NN took_VVD place_NN at_IN COP-1_NP and_CC led_VVD to_TO a_DT finding_NN that_IN/that progress_NN was_VBD not_RB "_`` adequate_JJ "_'' --_: and_CC so_RB to_TO negotiations_NNS that_WDT led_VVD to_TO the_DT Kyoto_NP Protocol_NP ,_, which_WDT has_VHZ more_JJR stringent_JJ commitments_NNS for_IN developed_JJ countries_NNS ._SENT 

Rio_NP Conventions_NPS 
Three_CD environmental_JJ conventions_NNS ,_, two_CD of_IN which_WDT were_VBD adopted_VVN at_IN the_DT 1992_CD "_`` Earth_NP Summit_NP "_'' in_IN Rio_NP de_NP Janeiro_NP :_: the_DT United_NP Nations_NPS Framework_NP Convention_NP on_IN Climate_NN Change_NP (_( UNFCCC_NP )_) ,_, and_CC the_DT Convention_NN on_IN Biodiversity_NP (_( CBD_NP )_) ,_, while_IN the_DT third_JJ ,_, the_DT United_NP Nations_NPS Convention_NP to_TO Combat_NP Desertification_NP (_( UNCCD_NP )_) ,_, was_VBD adopted_VVN in_IN 1994._CD The_DT issues_NNS addressed_VVN by_IN the_DT three_CD treaties_NNS are_VBP related_VVN --_: in_IN particular_JJ ,_, climate-change_NN can_MD have_VH adverse_JJ effects_NNS on_IN desertification_NN and_CC biodiversity_NN --_: and_CC through_IN a_DT Joint_NP Liaison_NP Group_NP ,_, the_DT secretariats_NNS of_IN the_DT three_CD conventions_NNS take_VVP steps_NNS to_TO coordinate_VV activities_NNS to_TO achieve_VV common_JJ progress_NN ._SENT 

Rio+20_NP

Removal_NN unit_NN (_( RMU_NP )_)

Rules_NNS of_IN procedure_NN

Second_NP Assessment_NP Report_NP (_( SAR_NP )_) 
An_DT extensive_JJ review_NN of_IN worldwide_JJ research_NN on_IN climate-change_NN compiled_VVN by_IN the_DT IPCC_NP and_CC published_VVN in_IN 1995._CD Some_DT 2_CD ,_, 000_CD scientists_NNS and_CC experts_NNS participated_VVD ._SENT The_DT report_NN is_VBZ also_RB known_VVN as_IN Climate_NN Change_NP 1995._CD The_DT SAR_NN concluded_VVD that_IN/that "_`` the_DT balance_NN of_IN evidence_NN suggests_VVZ that_IN/that there_EX is_VBZ a_DT discernible_JJ human_JJ influence_NN on_IN global_JJ climate_NN ._SENT "_`` It_PP also_RB said_VVD "_`` no-regrets_NNS options_NNS "_'' and_CC other_JJ cost-effective_JJ strategies_NNS exist_VVP for_IN combating_VVG climate-change_NN ._SENT 

Secretariat_NN

Sink_NN 
Any_DT process_NN ,_, activity_NN or_CC mechanism_NN which_WDT removes_VVZ a_DT greenhouse_NN gas_NN ,_, an_DT aerosol_NN or_CC a_DT precursor_NN of_IN a_DT greenhouse_NN gas_NN from_IN the_DT atmosphere_NN ._SENT Forests_NNS and_CC other_JJ vegetation_NN are_VBP considered_VVN sinks_NNS because_IN they_PP remove_VV carbon_NN dioxide_NN through_IN photosynthesis_NN ._SENT 

Special_JJ Climate_NN Change_NP Fund_NP (_( SCCF_NP )_) 
The_DT SCCF_NP was_VBD established_VVN to_TO finance_VV projects_NNS relating_VVG to_TO adaptation_NN ;_: technology_NN transfer_NN and_CC capacity_NN building_NN ;_: energy_NN ,_, transport_NN ,_, industry_NN ,_, agriculture_NN ,_, forestry_NN and_CC waste_NN management_NN ;_: and_CC economic_JJ diversification_NN ._SENT This_DT fund_NN should_MD complement_VV other_JJ funding_NN mechanisms_NNS for_IN the_DT implementation_NN of_IN the_DT Convention_NN ._SENT The_DT Global_NP Environment_NP Facility_NP (_( GEF_NP )_) ,_, as_IN the_DT entity_NN that_WDT operates_VVZ the_DT financial_JJ mechanism_NN of_IN the_DT Convention_NN ,_, has_VHZ been_VBN entrusted_VVN to_TO operate_VV this_DT fund_NN ._SENT More_JJR information_NN here_RB ._SENT 

"_`` Spill-over_NN effects_NNS "_'' (_( also_RB referred_VVN to_TO as_RB "_`` rebound_VV effects_NNS "_'' or_CC "_`` take-back_NN effects_NNS "_'' )_) 
Reverberations_NNS in_IN developing_VVG countries_NNS caused_VVN by_IN actions_NNS taken_VVN by_IN developed_VVN countries_NNS to_TO cut_VV greenhouse-gas_NN emissions_NNS ._SENT For_IN example_NN ,_, emissions_NNS reductions_NNS in_IN developed_JJ countries_NNS could_MD lower_VV demand_NN for_IN oil_NN and_CC thus_RB international_JJ oil_NN prices_NNS ,_, leading_VVG to_TO more_JJR use_NN of_IN oil_NN and_CC greater_JJR emissions_NNS in_IN developing_VVG nations_NNS ,_, partially_RB off-setting_VVG the_DT original_JJ cuts_NNS ._SENT Current_JJ estimates_NNS are_VBP that_DT full-scale_JJ implementation_NN of_IN the_DT Kyoto_NP Protocol_NP may_MD cause_VV 5_CD to_TO 20_CD per_IN cent_NN of_IN emissions_NNS reductions_NNS in_IN industrialized_JJ countries_NNS to_TO "_`` leak_VV "_'' into_IN developing_VVG countries_NNS ._SENT 

Subsidiary_NN body_NN 
A_DT committee_NN that_WDT assists_VVZ the_DT Conference_NN of_IN the_DT Parties_NNS ._SENT Two_CD permanent_JJ subsidiary_NN bodies_NNS are_VBP created_VVN by_IN the_DT Convention_NN :_: the_DT Subsidiary_NP Body_NP for_IN Implementation_NP (_( SBI_NP )_) and_CC the_DT Subsidiary_NP Body_NP for_IN Scientific_NP and_CC Technological_NP Advice_NP (_( SBSTA_NP )_) ._SENT Two_CD major_JJ temporary_JJ bodies_NNS that_WDT exist_VVP currently_RB are_VBP the_DT Ad_NP Hoc_NP Working_NP Group_NP on_IN Further_JJR Commitments_NNS for_IN Annex_NP I_NP Parties_NP under_IN the_DT Kyoto_NP Protocol_NP (_( AWG-KP_NP )_) ,_, established_VVN at_IN COP_NP 11_CD in_IN Montreal_NP ,_, and_CC the_DT Ad_NP Hoc_NP Working_NP Group_NP on_IN Long-term_JJ Cooperative_NP Action_NP under_IN the_DT Convention_NP (_( AWG-LCA_NP )_) ,_, established_VVN at_IN COP_NP 13_CD in_IN Bali_NP ._SENT Additional_JJ subsidiary_NN bodies_NNS may_MD be_VB established_VVN as_IN needed_VVN ._SENT

Third_NP Assessment_NP Report_NP (_( TAR_NP )_) 
The_DT third_JJ extensive_JJ review_NN of_IN global_JJ scientific_JJ research_NN on_IN climate-change_NN ,_, published_VVN by_IN the_DT IPCC_NP in_IN 2001._CD Among_IN other_JJ things_NNS ,_, the_DT report_NN stated_VVD that_IN/that "_`` The_DT Earth_NN 's_POS climate-system_NN has_VHZ demonstrably_RB changed_VVN on_IN both_DT global_JJ and_CC regional_JJ scales_NNS since_IN the_DT pre-industrial_JJ era_NN ,_, with_IN some_DT of_IN these_DT changes_NNS attributable_JJ to_TO human_JJ activities_NNS ._SENT There_EX is_VBZ new_JJ and_CC stronger_JJR evidence_NN that_IN/that most_JJS of_IN the_DT warming_NN observed_VVD over_IN the_DT last_JJ 50_CD years_NNS is_VBZ attributable_JJ to_TO human_JJ activities_NNS ._SENT "_'' The_DT TAR_NN also_RB focused_VVN on_IN the_DT regional_JJ effects_NNS of_IN climate-change_NN ._SENT

Vulnerability_NN
